function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People gathering in groups to participate in questionnaire","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close contact","Mitigation":"Implement online surveys or staggered in-person interviews","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, scheduling tools","People":"Participants, survey administrators","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Accumulated weighting analysis process involving 25 participants from each field","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to large group gatherings","Mitigation":"Use online platforms for data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Data collection software, virtual meeting platforms","People":"Participants, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
